Gaurav Vaishnav has marked this topic as unresolved.

hi everyone,
i have been working on hapi-fhir-jpastarter 5.6.0 and found out that the $expand and validate operation isnt working, it is returning below error

{{url}}/ValueSet/LL1000-0/$expand

{
"resourceType": "OperationOutcome",
"text": {
"status": "generated",
"issue": [
{
"severity": "error",
"code": "not-supported",
"diagnostics": "Invalid request: The FHIR endpoint on this server does not know how to handle GET operation[ValueSet/LL1000-0/$expand] with parameters [[]]"
}
]
}

and

localhost:8080/fhir/ValueSet/$expand?url=http://snomed.info/sct?fhir_vs&count=10&offset=1&filter=myocardial

{
"resourceType": "OperationOutcome",
"issue": [
{
"severity": "error",
"code": "not-supported",
"diagnostics": "Invalid request: The FHIR endpoint on this server does not know how to handle GET operation[ValueSet/$expand] with parameters [[filter, offset, count, url]]"
}
]
}
"diagnostics": "Invalid request: The FHIR endpoint on this server does not know how to handle GET operation[ValueSet/LL1000-0/$validate-code] with parameters [[code, system]]"
}

do i need to make any change in configuration for value set operation($expand , $Validate)
kindly help
thank you
